This is a dashboard for the [FluSight forecasting challenge](https://github.com/cdcepi/FluSight-forecast-hub/) that is organized by the US CDC. A page with forecast evaluations will be added at a later date.

::: {style='display:flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center'}

[View The Latest Forecasts](forecast.html){.btn .btn-primary role="button"}

:::

:::{.callout-note}
